name: A Lost Time Traveler
description:
There is a secret time traveler society within the wizarding community that no one, not even the other wizards know about them. These time travelers have the ability to rewind just a few minutes into the past, but all that was taken away many years ago. Now you are venturing out into the mansion ruins of the man that may have been behind it all, trying to find out why you are the only one that can rewind and why the other's cant.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move

Up Arrow to Jump

Shift to Climb Ladders

Shift to Pull Objects/Crates

Slash to Rewind

R to restart level

--

Dev Note {

/* Like the introduction? We'll guess what this isn't complete. Probably because of bad time management. We don't even have sound or sfx yet.. Haha.. But once the jam is over we're planning on working on it further and posting the polished version... So until then enjoy 2 questionable puzzles and character animation I guess.. Oh and making a video of this development process will be fun.. */
